content: I do not hold information about the exact steps the government is taking to protect the local fisheries in nova scotia. however, it is worth noting that the canadian government has implemented various measures to support sustainable fishing practices and protect marine ecosystems. for instance, the government has established conservation and management measures to regulate fishing activities, created marine protected areas to conserve important habitats, and invested in scientific research to monitor and assess the health of fish stocks. additionally, the government encourages sustainable fishing practices by implementing programs to support fishermen in adopting sustainable fishing practices and providing financial support for investments in sustainable fishing gear and equipment.
